name: AfterCronJob
description: Runs each time that the system calls the system cron job. This occurs after all scheduled tasks finish.

parameters.Variable: No input parameters for this hook point.

name: DailyCronJob
description: Runs at the very end of the daily automation cron execution.

parameters.Variable: No input parameters for this hook point.

name: DailyCronJobPreEmail
description: Runs after tasks have completed but before email report is sent.

parameters.Variable: No input parameters for this hook point.

name: PopEmailCollectionCronCompleted
description: Executes when the POP email collection cron completes.

parameters.Notes: An array of errors if an error occurred while attempting to connect to one or more mailboxes

name: PostAutomationTask
description: Executes after an automation task occurs

name: PreAutomationTask
description: Executes before an automation task occurs

name: PreCronJob
description: Runs before the daily automation cron execution.

parameters.Variable: No input parameters for this hook point.
